abstract: The activist investor Carl C. Icahn has taken issue with a recent column by the Deal Professor about his performance. Here is his rebuttal.
snippet: The activist investor Carl C. Icahn has taken issue with a recent column by the Deal Professor about his performance. Here is his rebuttal.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn is the chairman of Icahn Associates.

headline.main: Another View: Icahn Defends His Record
